channel.title: Need Help with what I thought was a simple Item Stats change lol
channel.description: Ok so I went into Item.cfg, found a bronze dagger, raised a few already existing stats, saved and compiled with IDE Eclipse, restarted server and client, went back in and stats are still the same. Lol I have messed with it for about an hour now with different items and such and nothing has correlated what so ever. Anything Im missing?

item.title: Need Help with what I thought was a simple Item Stats change lol
item.dc:creator: @Tyler7835 Tyler7835
item.description:
@Tyler7835 wrote:

What Base and everything are you using?

You have to make an itembonuspacker.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with what I thought was a simple Item Stats change lol
